body_html:
Hi @dhingratul,

Yes, at this point it's possible for any nodes to get fuzed into TRT, regardless of the nodes placement and other settings. This is a bug and we'll be addressing it. But there is a hack to prevent this by adding your node names to the outputs parameter of create_inference_graph() in the short term.

Please let me know if you have any questions. Thanks.

Please let me know if you have any questions. Thanks.
body:
Hi @dhingratul,

Yes, at this point it's possible for any nodes to get fuzed into TRT, regardless of the nodes placement and other settings. This is a bug and we'll be addressing it. But there is a hack to prevent this by adding your node names to the `outputs` parameter of `create_inference_graph()` in the short term.

Please let me know if you have any questions. Thanks.
